description.brazilian: Ingressou na Central de Comando pela primeira vez.
description.english: Arrived at the Command Center for the first time.
description.french: Arriver au poste de commandement pour la première fois.
description.german: Ich bin zum ersten Mal in der Kommandozentrale angekommen.
description.italian: Hai raggiunto il Centro di comando per la prima volta.
description.japanese: 初めてコマンドセンターに戻ってくる
description.russian: Первое прибытие в Центр управления.
description.schinese: 首次抵达指挥中心。
description.spanish: Has llegado al Centro de mando por primera vez.

description.brazilian: Realizei um trabalho de TI de alto risco em uma máquina fora de controle na Fornalha.
description.english: Did some high-risk IT work on an out-of-control machine down in The Crucible.
description.french: Effectuer un travail à haut risque sur une machine hors de contrôle dans le Creuset.
description.german: Ich habe einige riskante IT-Arbeiten an einem außer Kontrolle geratenen Computer unten im Schmelztiegel durchgeführt.
description.italian: Hai effettuato un'operazione informatica  pericolosa su una macchina fuori controllo nel Crogiolo.
description.japanese: 地下の溶融溜めで制御不能の機械を相手に高リスクの不具合処理を行う
description.koreana: 격리통로에 있는 통제불능의 기계에 고위험 IT 업무 수행.
description.russian: Выполнены IT-работы с высокой степенью риска на вышедшем из-под контроля устройстве в Горнило.
description.schinese: 为坩埚中某台失控的机器做一些高危IT工作。
description.spanish: Has hecho labores informáticas de alto riesgo en una máquina fuera de control en El Crisol.

displayName.brazilian: Melhor, Mais Rápido e Mais Forte
displayName.french: Toujours plus vite, toujours plus fort

description.brazilian: Tentou fazer alguma modificação genética recreativa.
description.english: Tried your hand at some recreational genetic modification.
description.french: S'essayer à la modification génétique récréative.
description.german: Du hast dich an einer Art genetischer Veränderung zu Erholungszwecken versucht.
description.italian: Hai provato a cimentarti in alcune modifiche genetiche ricreative.
description.japanese: 楽しい遺伝子操作に手を染める
description.russian: Испытаны свои силы в генетической модификации на досуге.
description.schinese: 试一试娱乐性基因改造。
description.spanish: Has probado suerte con alguna modificación genética lúdica.

description.brazilian: Fizemos algumas modificações de reposição em suas armas.
description.english: Made some aftermarket modifications to your weapons.
description.french: Apporter quelques modifications à vos armes.
description.german: Du hast nachträgliche Modifikationen an deinen Waffen vorgenommen.
description.italian: Hai effettuato alcune modifiche alle tue armi.
description.japanese: 購入した火器の改造に手を染める
description.russian: Сделаны дополнительные модификации оружия после покупки.
description.schinese: 对你的武器进行了改装。
description.spanish: Le has realizado modificaciones a tus armas tras comprarlas.

description.brazilian: Entrou no Elevador de Cargas.
description.english: Boarded the Cargo Elevator.
description.french: Utiliser le monte-charge.
description.german: Ich bin in den Lastenaufzug gestiegen.
description.italian: Hai preso il montacarichi.
description.japanese: 貨物エレベータに乗る
description.russian: Использован грузовой лифт.
description.schinese: 登上货运电梯。
description.spanish: Te has montado en el ascensor de carga.

description.brazilian: Teve o primeiro (?) contato com o Nefilim.
description.english: Made first (?) contact with the Nephilim.
description.french: Vous avez établi un premier (?) contact avec le Nephilim.
description.german: Mache ersten (?) Kontakt mit dem Nephilim.
description.italian: Hai incontrato per la prima (?) volta il Nefilim.
description.japanese: ネフィリムと初めて(?)遭遇する
description.russian: Вступите в контакт с Нефилимом в первый (?) раз.
description.schinese: 首次（？）与拿非利人接触。
description.spanish: Establece contacto por primera vez (?) con el Nefilim.

description.brazilian: Encontrou uma Sala Segura.
description.english: Located a Safe Room.
description.french: Vous avez trouvé la salle sécurisée.
description.german: Finde einen Safe Room.
description.italian: Entra in una Stanza Antipanico.
description.japanese: 保安区画を発見する
description.russian: Найдите убежище.
description.schinese: 找到一间安全屋。
description.spanish: Encuentra una habitación del pánico.

description.brazilian: Sobreviveu à sua primeira festa no escritório.
description.english: Survived your first office party.
description.french: Vous avez survécu à votre première fête entre collègues.
description.german: Überlebe deine erste Büroparty.
description.italian: Hai superato il tuo cordiale "benvenuto" in ufficio.
description.japanese: 最初のオフィスパーティーを生き残る
description.koreana: 로비에서 진행되는 입사 축하 파티에서 살아남기.
description.russian: Переживите свой первый корпоратив.
description.schinese: 在你的第一场办公室派对中活下来。
description.spanish: Sobrevive a tu primera fiesta en la oficina.

description.brazilian: Acessou uma Área Restrita.
description.english: Accessed a Restricted Area.
description.french: Vous avez accédé à une zone réglementée
description.german: Betritt ein Sperrgebiet.
description.italian: Hai raggiunto un'area ad accesso ristretto.
description.japanese: 制限区画に進入する
description.russian: Получите доступ к ограниченной зоне.
description.schinese: 进入一处限制区域。
description.spanish: Accede a un área restringida.

displayName.japanese: 引き継ぎミーティング

description.brazilian: Adquiriu um "dispositivo" de segurança biométrica...
description.english: Acquired a biometric security… device…
description.french: Vous avez obtenu un... machin... de sécurité biométrique
description.german: Erhalte ein biometrisches Sicherheits... -gerät ...
description.italian: Hai ottenuto un dispositivo di... sicurezza... biometrico.
description.japanese: 生体認証…機器を…取得…
description.russian: Получите... приспособление... для открытия биометрического замка.
description.schinese: 获得一个生物识别安保……装置……
description.spanish: Consigue un... dispositivo... biométrico... de seguridad...

description.brazilian: Fez seu próprio caminho.
description.english: Made your own path.
description.french: Vous vous êtes frayé un chemin.
description.german: Bahne deinen eigenen Weg.
description.italian: Hai creato la tua "strada".
description.japanese: 進入路を切り開く
description.koreana: 실험실 레벨의 시한 폭탄이 터질 때까지 살아남기.
description.russian: Проложите свой собственный путь.
description.schinese: 开辟属于自己的全新道路。
description.spanish: Ábrete paso.

description.brazilian: Detonou o Nefilim na porrada.
description.english: Kicked the Nephilim's ass.
description.french: Vous avez botté le cul du Nephilim.
description.german: Tritt dem Nephilim in den Arsch.
description.italian: Hai dato una lezione al Nefilim.
description.japanese: ネフィリムをぶちのめす
description.russian: Надерите Нефилиму задницу.
description.schinese: 爆杀拿非利人。
description.spanish: Dale la del pulpo al Nefilim.

description.brazilian: Entrou nos Túneis de Saneamento.
description.english: Entered the Sanitation Tunnels.
description.french: Vous avez pénétré dans les tunnels d'assainissement.
description.german: Betritt die Kanalisation.
description.italian: Hai raggiunto i tunnel di sanificazione.
description.japanese: 防疫トンネルに進入する
description.russian: Войдите в дезинфекционные туннели.
description.schinese: 进入清污管道。
description.spanish: Entra en los túneles de alcantarillado.

displayName.japanese: 知ってるハズなんだけど

description.brazilian: Se perdeu em algum lugar nos fundos do prédio.
description.english: Got lost somewhere in the back of the building.
description.french: Vous vous êtes perdu quelque part derrière le bâtiment.
description.german: Verirre dich irgendwo hinten im Gebäude.
description.italian: Hai perso la strada da qualche parte nel retro dell'edificio.
description.japanese: 建物の裏で迷子になる
description.russian: Заблудитесь где-то в глубине здания.
description.schinese: 在大楼后方某处迷失方向。
description.spanish: Piérdete en algún lugar de la parte trasera del edificio.

description.brazilian: Recrutou o Agente Escoteiro.
description.english: Recruited Agent Boy Scout.
description.french: Vous avez recruté l'agent Boy Scout.
description.german: Rekrutiere Agent Boy Scout.
description.italian: Hai reclutato l'agente Boyscout.
description.japanese: エージェント・ボーイスカウトを雇用する
description.russian: Наймите агента Бойскаута.
description.schinese: 招募童子军特工。
description.spanish: Recluta al agente Explorador.

description.brazilian: Recrutou a Agente Béquer.
description.english: Recruited Agent Beaker.
description.french: Vous avez recruté l'agent Beaker.
description.german: Rekrutiere Agent Beaker.
description.italian: Hai reclutato l'agente Beaker.
description.japanese: エージェント・ビーカーを雇用する
description.russian: Наймите агента Бикер.
description.schinese: 招募烧杯特工。
description.spanish: Recluta a la agente Beaker.

displayName.brazilian: Não Dava pra Resolver por E-mail?
displayName.english: This Could Have Been an Email
displayName.french: On aurait pu faire ça par courriel
displayName.german: Das hätte eine Email sein können
displayName.japanese: メール一本で済んだはず
displayName.spanish: Esto podría haber sido un correo

description.brazilian: Recrutou a Agente Bisturi.
description.english: Recruited Agent Scalpel
description.french: Vous avez recruté l'agent Scalpel
description.german: Rekrutiere Agent Scalpel.
description.italian: Hai reclutato l'agente Scalpel.
description.japanese: エージェント・スキャルペルを雇用する
description.russian: Наймите агента Скальпель.
description.schinese: 招募柳叶刀特工。
description.spanish: Recluta a la agente Escalpelo.

displayName.japanese: 侵入成功（ハッカーっぽい声で）

description.brazilian: Abriu a porta de segurança no Nível de Estacionamento.
description.english: Opened the secure door in the Parking Level.
description.french: Vous avez ouvert la porte blindée du niveau parking.
description.german: Öffne die Sicherheitstür auf der Parketage.
description.italian: Hai aperto la porta di sicurezza del livello del Parcheggio.
description.japanese: 駐車場階層の保安扉を開ける
description.russian: Откройте кодовую дверь на парковке.
description.schinese: 开启停车层的安全门。
description.spanish: Abre la puerta de seguridad en el nivel Aparcamiento.

description.brazilian: Comprou alguma coisa.
description.english: Did some shopping.
description.french: Vous avez fait des achats.
description.german: Geh einkaufen.
description.italian: Hai effettuato acquisti.
description.japanese: 何か買い物をする
description.russian: Купите что-нибудь.
description.schinese: 购物一番。
description.spanish: Ve de compras.

description.brazilian: Desbloqueou o segundo nível de Melhorias de Agente.
description.english: Unlocked the second tier of Agent Upgrades.
description.french: Vous avez déverrouillé le second niveau des améliorations d'agent.
description.german: Schalte die zweite Stufe von Agentenupgrades frei.
description.italian: Hai sbloccato la seconda fascia dei Potenziamenti agente.
description.japanese: エージェントアップグレードの第２グループをアンロックする
description.russian: Откройте второй уровень улучшений агента.
description.schinese: 解锁第二级特工升级。
description.spanish: Desbloquea el segundo nivel de mejoras de agente.

description.brazilian: Preencheu todos os espaços de aprimoramento em uma única arma.
description.english: Filled all the perk slots on a single weapon.
description.french: Vous avez rempli tous les emplacements de talent d'une arme.
description.german: Fülle alle Vorteils-Slots einer einzelnen Waffe.
description.italian: Hai riempito tutti gli slot benefici di un'arma.
description.japanese: 一つの火器の追加特性スロットをすべて埋める
description.russian: Заполните все слоты для бонусов одного оружия.
description.schinese: 为一件武器配满特性。
description.spanish: Llena todos los espacios de ventajas para una única arma.

description.brazilian: Completou o painel do arsenal.
description.english: Completed the armory wall.
description.french: Vous avez complété tout le mur de l'armurerie.
description.german: Vervollständige die Waffenwand.
description.italian: Hai completato la parete dell'Armeria.
description.japanese: 火器ギャラリーをすべてアンロックする
description.russian: Повесьте на стену арсенала максимум оружия.
description.schinese: 收集武器库收纳墙上的所有武器。
description.spanish: Completa la pared de arsenal.

description.brazilian: Adquiriu todos os pacotes de acessórios de armas.
description.english: Acquired all weapon attachment packs.
description.french: Vous avez obtenu tous les lots d'accessoires d'arme.
description.german: Erhalte alle Waffenaufsatzpacks.
description.italian: Hai ottenuto tutti i pacchetti di accessori delle armi.
description.japanese: 火器アタッチメントパックをすべて取得する
description.russian: Получите все наборы приспособлений для оружия.
description.schinese: 取得所有武器附件包。
description.spanish: Consigue los packs de accesorios de todas las armas.

description.brazilian: Desbloqueou todos os arquivos de caso da Agente Vermelha.
description.english: Unlocked all of Agent Red's casefiles.
description.french: Vous avez déverrouillé tous les dossiers de l'agent Red.
description.german: Schalte alle von Agent Reds Fallakten frei.
description.italian: Hai sbloccato tutti i fascicoli dell'agente Red.
description.japanese: エージェント・レッドの事案ファイルをすべてアンロックする
description.russian: Откройте все файлы досье агента Ред.
description.schinese: 解锁红特工的所有案卷。
description.spanish: Desbloquea todos los expedientes de la agente Roja.

description.brazilian: Desbloqueou todos os arquivos de caso do Agente Escoteiro.
description.english: Unlocked all of Agent Boy Scout's casefiles.
description.french: Vous avez déverrouillé tous les dossiers de l'agent Boy Scout.
description.german: Schalte alle von Agent Boy Scouts Fallakten frei.
description.italian: Hai sbloccato tutti i fascicoli dell'agente Boyscout.
description.japanese: エージェント・ボーイスカウトの事案ファイルをすべてアンロックする
description.russian: Откройте все файлы досье агента Бойскаута.
description.schinese: 解锁童子军特工的所有案卷。
description.spanish: Desbloquea todos los expedientes del agente Explorador.

description.brazilian: Desbloqueou todos os arquivos de caso da Agente Béquer.
description.english: Unlocked all of Agent Beaker's casefiles.
description.french: Vous avez déverrouillé tous les dossiers de l'agent Beaker.
description.german: Schalte alle von Agent Beakers Fallakten frei.
description.italian: Hai sbloccato tutti i fascicoli dell'agente Beaker.
description.japanese: エージェント・ビーカーの事案ファイルをすべてアンロックする
description.russian: Откройте все файлы досье агента Бикер.
description.schinese: 解锁烧杯特工的所有案卷。
description.spanish: Desbloquea todos los expedientes de la agente Beaker.

description.brazilian: Desbloqueou todos os arquivos de caso da Agente Bisturi.
description.english: Unlocked all of Agent Scalpel's casefiles.
description.french: Vous avez déverrouillé tous les dossiers de l'agent Scalpel.
description.german: Schalte alle von Agent Scalpels Fallakten frei.
description.italian: Hai sbloccato tutti i fascicoli dell'agente Scalpel.
description.japanese: エージェント・スキャルペルの事案ファイルをすべてアンロックする
description.russian: Откройте все файлы досье агента Скальпель.
description.schinese: 解锁柳叶刀特工的所有案卷。
description.spanish: Desbloquea todos los expedientes de la agente Escalpelo.

description.brazilian: Derrotou o Nefilim sozinho na dificuldade 3 ou superior.
description.english: Defeated the Nephilim on difficulty 3 or higher by yourself.
description.french: Vous avez vaincu le Nephilim tout seul, en difficulté 3 ou plus.
description.german: Besiege den Nephilim alleine auf Schwierigkeit 3 oder höher.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto il Nefilim alla difficoltà 3 o superiore senza l'aiuto degli altri.
description.japanese: 難易度３以上の単独プレイでネフィリムを倒す
description.russian: Победите Нефилима на уровне сложности 3 или выше в одиночку.
description.schinese: 在难度 3 或以上难度单独击败拿非利人。
description.spanish: Derrota al Nefilim en dificultad 3 o mayor en solitario.

description.brazilian: Reanimou um aliado caído.
description.english: Revived a fallen ally.
description.french: Vous avez réanimé un allié à terre.
description.german: Belebe einen Verbündeten wieder.
description.italian: Hai rianimato un agente a terra.
description.japanese: ダウンしたエージェントを蘇生する
description.russian: Возродите погибшего союзника.
description.schinese: 救援一名倒地友军。
description.spanish: Reanima a un aliado caído.

description.brazilian: Foi reanimado por um aliado.
description.english: Got revived by an ally.
description.french: Vous avez été réanimé par un allié.
description.german: Werde von einem Verbündeten wiederbelebt.
description.italian: Un alleato ti ha rianimato.
description.japanese: 他のエージェントから蘇生処置を受ける
description.russian: Возродитесь благодаря помощи союзника.
description.schinese: 被一名友军救援。
description.spanish: Recibe reanimación por parte de un aliado.

description.brazilian: Derrotou o Nefilim na dificuldade 3 ou superior no modo multiplayer.
description.english: Defeated the Nephilim on difficulty 3 or higher in multiplayer.
description.french: Vous avez vaincu le Nephilim en multijoueur, en difficulté 3 ou plus.
description.german: Besiege den Nephilim in Multiplayer auf Schwierigkeit 3 oder höher.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto il Nefilim alla difficoltà 3 o superiore in modalità multigiocatore.
description.japanese: 難易度３以上のマルチプレイヤープレイでネフィリムを倒す
description.russian: Победите Нефилима на уровне сложности 3 или выше в многопользовательском режиме.
description.schinese: 在难度 3 或以上难度的多人游戏中击败拿非利人。
description.spanish: Derrota al Nefilim en dificultad 3 o mayor en multijugador.

description.brazilian: Descobriu um final secreto.
description.english: Discovered a hidden ending.
description.french: Vous avez découvert une fin cachée.
description.german: Entdecke ein verstecktes Ende.
description.italian: Hai scoperto un finale segreto.
description.japanese: 秘密のエンディングを見る
description.russian: Откройте скрытую концовку.
description.schinese: 解锁隐藏结局。
description.spanish: Descubre un final secreto.

displayName.japanese: 俺はエージェントだ、殺し屋じゃない

description.brazilian: Eliminou 5.000 inimigos.
description.english: Kill 5,000 enemies.
description.french: Vous avez tué 5 000 ennemis.
description.german: Töte 5.000 Feinde.
description.italian: Uccidi 5.000 nemici.
description.japanese: 敵を5000体倒す
description.russian: Убейте 5000 врагов.
description.schinese: 击杀 5000 个敌人。
description.spanish: Mata a 5 000 enemigos.

displayName.japanese: プラチナカード所持者

description.brazilian: Adquiriu 3 Aprimoramentos Sinápticos Platina em uma única partida.
description.english: Acquired 3 Platinum Synaptic Enhancements in a single run.
description.french: Vous avez acquis 3 améliorations synaptiques platine en une seule tentative.
description.german: Erhalte 3 Platin-Level Synaptische Verbesserungen in einem einzigen Run.
description.italian: Hai ottenuto 3 potenziamenti sinaptici in una sola partita.
description.japanese: 一回のランで３つのプラチナのシナプス強化を取得
description.russian: Получите 3 платиновых синаптических усиления за одно прохождение.
description.schinese: 单次流程中获得 3 项铂金突触强化。
description.spanish: Consigue 3 mejoras sinápticas platino en un único intento.

description.brazilian: Alcançou um saldo de 5.000 créditos durante uma partida.
description.english: Hit a credit balance of 5,000 during a run.
description.french: Vous atteignez un solde de 5 000 au cours d'une tentative.
description.german: Erreiche einen Credit-Stand von 5.000 während eines Runs.
description.italian: Raggiungi un credito di 5.000 durante una partita.
description.japanese: 一回のランでクレジット残高が5,000を超過
description.russian: Заработайте 5 000 кредитов за одно прохождение.
description.schinese: 单次流程中信用点余额达到 5000。
description.spanish: Acumula un total de 5 000 créditos en un único intento.

description.brazilian: Aumentou seu crânio duas vezes em uma única partida.
description.english: Enlarge your cranium twice in one run.
description.french: Vous avez agrandi votre crâne deux fois en une tentative.
description.german: Vergrößere dein Kranium zwei Mal in einem Run.
description.italian: Ingrandisci la tua testa due volte in una partita.
description.japanese: 一回のランで頭蓋骨を２回大きくする
description.russian: Увеличьте свой череп дважды за одно прохождение.
description.schinese: 单次流程中扩张天灵盖两次。
description.spanish: Aumenta el tamaño de tu cráneo dos veces en un único intento.

description.brazilian: Eliminou um Supervisor durante um avanço.
description.english: Kill an Overseer mid-charge.
description.french: Vous avez tué un superviseur en pleine charge.
description.german: Töte einen Aufseher während eines Sturmangriffs.
description.italian: Uccidi un Supervisore a metà carica.
description.japanese: チャージ中の監督者を倒す
description.russian: Убейте Надзирателя во время его рывка.
description.schinese: 击杀一个冲锋途中的监视者。
description.spanish: Mata a un Supervisor mientras carga.

description.brazilian: Derrotou um Espectro enquanto ele estiver no estado Astral.
description.english: Defeat a Specter while it’s in Astral state.
description.french: Vous avez vaincu un spectre sous forme astrale.
description.german: Besiege ein Gespenst, während es im Astral-Zustand ist.
description.italian: Sconfiggi uno Spettro mentre è in stato Astrale.
description.japanese: 超常状態のスペクターを倒す
description.russian: Победите Призрака, пока тот находится в астрале.
description.schinese: 击杀一个处于星界状态的幽影。
description.spanish: Derrota a un espectro que se encuentre en estado astral.

description.brazilian: Limpou o concreto caído enquanto enfrenta o Exoesqueleto.
description.english: Clean up some fallen concrete while fighting the Exosuit.
description.french: Vous avez nettoyé des gravats de béton tout en affrontant l'Exocombi.
description.german: Räume etwas von dem gefallenen Beton auf, während du gegen den Exosuit kämpfst.
description.italian: Rimuovi un po' di macerie cadute mentre affronti l'Esoscheletro.
description.japanese: エクソスーツとの戦闘中に落ちてきたコンクリートを清掃する
description.koreana: 엑소슈트와 싸울 때 떨어진 큰 콘크리트 부수기.
description.russian: Уберите осколки бетона во время сражения с Экзоскелетом.
description.schinese: 在与外骨骼作战的同时清理掉落的水泥板。
description.spanish: Limpia los escombros mientras peleas contra el Exotraje.

displayName.spanish: Y no te ha hecho falta una caja

description.brazilian: Eliminou cinco inimigos consecutivos sem ser detectado.
description.english: Eliminate five enemies consecutively without being detected.
description.french: Vous avez éliminé cinq ennemis coup sur coup, sans vous faire détecter.
description.german: Eliminiere fünf Feinde hintereinander, ohne entdeckt zu werden.
description.italian: Elimina cinque nemici di fila senza farti scoprire.
description.japanese: 自分の存在を気づかれずに連続で敵を５体倒す
description.koreana: 나를 감지하지 못한 적 5마리 연속 처치.
description.russian: Устраните пятерых врагов подряд так, чтобы вас не обнаружили.
description.schinese: 消灭五个敌人，从头到尾不被发现。
description.spanish: Elimina a cinco enemigos consecutivos sin que te detecten.

description.brazilian: Eliminou três inimigos ao mesmo tempo com um único disparo.
description.english: Eliminate three enemies simultaneously with a single bullet.
description.french: Vous avez éliminé trois ennemis simultanément, d'une seule balle.
description.german: Eliminiere drei Feinde gleichzeitig mit einer Kugel.
description.italian: Elimina tre nemici contemporaneamente con un solo colpo.
description.japanese: 一発の弾丸で敵を３体倒す
description.russian: Устраните трех врагов сразу одним выстрелом.
description.schinese: 用一发子弹击杀三个敌人。
description.spanish: Elimina a tres enemigos simultáneamente de un solo disparo.

description.brazilian: Causou dano a seis inimigos simultaneamente.
description.english: Damage six enemies simultaneously.
description.french: Vous avez endommagé six ennemis en même temps.
description.german: Beschädige sechs Feinde gleichzeitig.
description.italian: Danneggia sei nemici contemporaneamente.
description.japanese: 同時に６体の敵にダメージを与える
description.russian: Нанесите урон шести врагам сразу.
description.schinese: 对六个敌人同时造成伤害。
description.spanish: Daña a seis enemigos simultáneamente.
